preserve_source_structure.templateDescription: Maintains original folder structure with minimal wrapping. Creates a single 'Files' folder containing the preserved source structure, with Documents folder placed beside it.

metadata.author: System
metadata.notes: This template preserves the exact folder structure of source files without adding any additional organizational layers. Ideal for cases where source material is already well-organized. Documents are placed beside the preserved structure, not within it. ZIP archive creation follows user settings.
